credit_line: Gift of Mrs. W.G. Dunnington, Jr.
title: Bidet
description: a) Carved fruitwood bidet with caned back, four cabriole legs, back ones having rocaille ornament at foot, front ones with small scrolls at foot; leather covered hinged lid at top of back support concealing three compartments. b) hinged, double caned seat concealing (c) removable faience bowl with blue floral sprays and border on blue-white glaze.
name: Bidet
